title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.2 - Designation of records access officer and appeals officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.2 - Designation of records access officer and appeals officer

State Regulations
(a) A records access officer shall be
designated by the board's executive director for purposes of this Part. The
name, title, business address and business phone number of such designee will
be posted on the agency's website. (b) An appeals officer shall be designated by
the board's executive director for purposes of this Part. The name, title, business address and business phone number of such designee will be posted on
the agency's website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
208.2

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
